title: STAT+: FDA clears Aidoc tool to detect 14 different conditions from a CT scan
description: FDA cleared an AI tool from Aidoc that can detect multiple conditions from a single CT scan.
content: FDA cleared an AI tool from Aidoc that can detect multiple conditions from a single CT scan.
